scripts.say: Hell yeah! This should be the last of these idiots!
Blanc sure is energetic... pummeling away at those clones even though they look just like her.
Hmph... isn't that obvious? These frickin' clones are creepy as hell.
We have to mop them up as fast as we can... Come to think of it, Vert, you didn't hold back against your clone either in the previous zone.
How do I put it... it's like hatred towards your relatives? My power kept welling up.
Somehow... that makes a lot of sense.
We've also been fighting off clones of ourselves here... Somehow, I'm not even sure if this is being caused by someone else...
There's too much we don't know about the Mirror Seas...
It seems like this situation won't be resolved so easily...
Good work, everyone. I've managed to gather some new data.
However, it's not quite enough. Please collect a bit more data from the Mirror Seas.
Huuh? You've gotta be kidding me. We've been at it for ages!
Almost, I just need a little bit more! To put it concretely, around one stage's worth? I should be able to finish with that.
There you have it. Thank you for your consideration, everyone.
Ah! What the hell? Don't you dare disconnect just yet!
You said to investigate the Mirror Space, but we've already 100%'d this zone! The hell are we supposed to do? Hey! Histoire! Damn it, respond!
Oh my, looks like we have no choice. We'll simply have to wait here elegantly until the next Mirror Space opens up.
Good grief... You sure are calm though, Vert, for not being able to go home still.
Indeed... I'm not in any particular rush to get back home. (Squeeze!)
Eh...? Why is Vert hugging Laffey?
U-um... Vert, what kind of hug is this...?
There are so many cute girls here... Aaahh, I wouldn't mind being stuck here forever!
... There it is again. You could call it Vert's mental illness... I don't even want to say anything.
